prompt:
A boldly seductive adult Korean woman in her 20s in a sporty resort setting near a small pool,
late afternoon editorial.
Pose: standing, hips angled forward, one hand gripping a towel at her hip (tasteful), the other
hand adjusting hair; subtle arch.
Expression: dominant gaze, half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile.
Swimwear: sporty cut one-piece (matte), textured fabric.
Lighting: warm side light + pale bounce, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Kodak Gold 200 vibe, subtle grain.
Exclude text/logos; no nudity; no explicit close-ups.
